last_episode_to_air.name: A Little Resurrection
last_episode_to_air.overview: Aoife Cassidy's past reveals answers in the present. Colman closes in on his suspects. But will Lorna find peace at last?

name: The Woman in the Wall
overview: Lorna Brady wakes one morning to find a corpse in her house. Brady has no idea who the dead woman is or if she herself might be responsible for the apparent murder, because she has long suffered from extreme bouts of sleepwalking.

episodes.name: Back to Life
episodes.overview: Ireland, 2015. When Lorna Brady wakes to find a corpse in her house, she has no idea who the dead woman is or if she's responsible for the apparent murder.

episodes.name: Show Thyself
episodes.overview: Lorna has no intention of sleeping until she finds out what Aoife Cassidy knew. The town's laundry survivors are campaigning for justice. Past betrayals emerge to the surface and end in tragedy.

episodes.name: Knock Knock
episodes.overview: A new lead means Lorna might finally discover the fate of her daughter, but Colman is closing in. The case takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.name: The Cruelty Man
episodes.overview: Lorna uncovers more horrors at the convent. In Dublin, Colman delves into his own past and discovers the source of his nightmares. A new lead cracks open the case.

episodes.name: Ex Gratia
episodes.overview: Lorna and Colman become unusual allies when in pursuit of the truth. The survivors receive life-changing news. A fresh suspect emerges in the murder case.

episodes.name: A Little Resurrection
episodes.overview: Aoife Cassidy's past reveals answers in the present. Colman closes in on his suspects. But will Lorna find peace at last?
